product_name: Moving Comfort Flex Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Odor-resistant and moisture-wicking to keep you dry, the women's Moving Comfort Flex hoodie offers an extra touch of workout warmth concealed in a fun-loving hoodie. Nylon, polyester and spandex fabric offers warm comfort before, during and after workouts; it wicks moisture, dries quickly and resists odors. Fitted hood with a high collar features an adjustable ribbon drawstring to help dial in the fit. Rib-knit cuffs feature thumbholes to help keep sleeves in place and warm hands. The fitted Moving Comfort Flex hoodie offers a next-to-body fit. 26.5 in. length; ribbed at hood and cuffs. Closeout.
short_description: Odor-resistant and moisture-wicking to keep you dry, the women's Moving Comfort Flex hoodie offers an extra touch of workout warmth concealed in a fun-loving hoodie.
